thread.title: Re: Violence continues in Berkeley: WATCH video of Trump supporter attacked TODAY on edge campus
thread.title_full: Re: Violence continues in Berkeley: WATCH video of Trump supporter attacked TODAY on edge campus

author: Hey, That's Pretty Good
title: Re: Violence continues in Berkeley: WATCH video of Trump supporter attacked TODAY on edge campus
text:
Berkeley violence continues: WATCH video of Trump supporter reportedly attacked TODAY on edge of campus Posted at 4:57 pm on February 2, 2017 by Sam J. 
The day after “riots”… err … protests rocked Berkeley, it would appear tensions are still very high, even on the edge of campus. 
Watch the footage: This just happened at UC Berkeley. Trump supporter attacked by two men on edge of campus. Student describes it as aftershock of last night pic.twitter.com/3Ne5pJmXAM 
— Jodi Hernandez (@JodiHernandezTV) February 2, 2017 
Wow. 
“F*ck you fascist,” the guy who seems to have just attacked someone for their political views yells from the safety of his truck. Trending Berkeley violence continues: WATCH video of Trump supporter reportedly attacked TODAY on edge of campus 
What a tough guy. @JodiHernandezTV @nbcbayarea I don't remember Republicans acting like this when Obama was elected. They just waited for 4 years to go by. 
— That Girl (@robin_hauff) February 2, 2017 
Because Republicans didn’t act like this. @JodiHernandezTV @nbcbayarea This type of behavior against Trump supporters has been happening nationwide for months. Where have u been? 
What’s so shocking about this is the fact that it’s so shocking to some people. To this gal’s point, there have been many instances of Trump supporters being attacked physically over the past year. @JodiHernandezTV @hotline_ping006 hope they get that under control. Violence is never acceptable.
